elements.comment: This is a hidden note. Right-click to view or edit.

elements.text:
As a person is
to the group,
so the group is
to larger groups

the docs stay
at the source

local app on
laptop could
control access

how do you
represent people
in your group?
or, groups
in your group?

every student writes
a personal profile doc

read a few
other people's
profile docs

meet someone
random. summarize/share
 a few folks you know.

make intros
that "make sense".
especially between
connector-type
people

people can 
form a
proto-team if
they want

people keep
their own
connection list

Generates 500 random
 profiles with made-up
 details.
